content: Thank you Randy, so much erotica misses the teasing, the anticipation, for the definitive story read Anais Nin, the name of the story escapes me now but the action is only the hint as the character irons his pants. These days the graphic description passes for the act when the act only truly lives in imagination, in the feeling of it. I too look for the unfolding of the story, the slow reveal and, if we are lucky, the passion play within. B
